entry.title: RSVP
entry.summary: Please email all RSVP requests to bfelliswedding@gmail.com Things to include in your email: Alternatively, if you received an invitation, scan the QR Code with your phone and fill out the corresponding form!
entry.content:
Please email all RSVP requests to bfelliswedding@gmail.com

Things to include in your email:

  • Your name
  • # of guests, including yourself
  • Any additional comments

Alternatively, if you received an invitation, scan the QR Code with your phone and fill out the corresponding form!

entry.title: Overview
entry.summary: Overview The ceremony will take place at 11:00 AM, on 3/25/23 at the following venue: Our Lady of Victory Parish 4414 Wilkens Ave Baltimore, MD 21229 The reception will take place immediately after the ceremony at the following venue: The King's Contrivance Restaurant 10150 Shaker…
entry.content:
Overview

The ceremony will take place at 11:00 AM, on 3/25/23 at the following venue:

Our Lady of Victory Parish
4414 Wilkens Ave
Baltimore, MD 21229

The reception will take place immediately after the ceremony at the following venue:

The King's Contrivance Restaurant
10150 Shaker Dr
Columbia, MD 21046

To navigate to the reception hall,

  • Take Wilkens Avenue up towards 695 South (exit to the right of the church and continue straight until you find the exit on the left)
  • Keep right and follow signs for I-95 South towards Washington
  • Take I-95 South until you hit exit 38B for Route 32 West, towards Columbia,
  • Take exit 15 for Shaker Drive and turn left, destination will be on the right.

RSVP

For information about RSVPs, click here.

Wedding Registry

To view the wedding registry, click here.

Photos

You are free to take as many pictures as you'd like and we'd love to see them too.

To upload photos, please click here.

If you want to view the gallery of uploaded photos, please click here.

Questions

For any questions please email bfelliswedding@gmail.com.
